name: Museo Tz'unun 'Ya
excerpt: This museum focuses on the history of the Tz'utujil people and geology of the region, with a film on the formation of the lake and an interesting galleryâ€¦
detail_description: This museum focuses on the history of the Tz'utujil people and geology of the region, with a film on the formation of the lake and an interesting gallery of colorized photos of San Pedro in former days. As a bonus, staff will identify and interpret your nahual (animal counterpart), based on your birth date according to the Maya calendar.
